metadata.title: CVE-2019-20092 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1.0. There is a NULL pointerdereference in AP4_Descriptor::GetTag in mp42ts when called fromAP4_EsDescriptor::GetDecoderConfigDescriptor in Ap4EsDescriptor.cpp.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
